description:
Senior Dental Technician - Metal 
  Reports to: General Manager
  
  
  ABOUT MILIDENT 
  Opened in June 1995, Milident Inc specializes in the creation of complex cases, implant-supported crown and bridge, fixed and removable dentures as well as orthodontic appliances. Always at the forefront of technology, Milident Inc. continues to offer its products and services tailored to the specific needs of its clientele. Through its internal research and development program, Milident Inc. is continually exploring new technological advances in manufacturing its high-precision dental prosthesis.
  
  
  Description: 
  Milident Dental Laboratory is currently seeking an experienced, skilled metal dental lab technicians to work full time in our dental lab. If you have at least five years’ relevant experience in a dental lab – we want to hear from you!.
  
  
  Ceramic-metal and metal restoration 
  
  QC cases coming out of plaster room before production 
  Prepare the margins of the dies 
  Apply the "spacer" on the dies 
  Wax the copings 
  Prepares the spruing stems 
 
 
  prepares and performs the pouring of the "investing" mixture 
  Performs the metal casting (casting) 
  Adjust the copings on the dies 
  Orders implant components
 
  
  
  Aesthetic restoration 
  
  Make Emax crowns 
  Performs diagnostic waxing of cosmetic cases 
  Make temporary crowns and bridges
 
  
  
  Other techniques 
  
  Presses all porcelain crowns 
  Scans the crowns and bridge in Procera / Zircon / Lava 
  Fits Procera / Zircon / Lava cups on dies 
  Performs conventional welding 
 
 
  Performs laser welding 
  Performs restorations on implants 
  Perform restorations with attachments
 
  
  
  Qualifications: 
  
  Certification as a Registered Dental Technician or equivalent education and experience 
  5+ years of experience in dental technology, CAD design experience a plus 
  Must possess effective oral communication and interpersonal skills with ability to deal with all levels of personnel in a professional and effective manner 
  Must have a thorough understanding of porcelain pressing technology, crown morphology, and crown and bridge case design 
  Same-day denture experience is a bonus, but not required
